chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t <-> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t

Premises:
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
eqc_B_CS : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t -> eqc m z t
eqc_B_CN : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
plf = fix plf (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 _ _ _ => plf m0 | L m0 zero x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 (cA_1 m0 one x) y) | L m0 one x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 x (cA m0 zero y)) end : fmap -> Prop
expfo_expf : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> expfo m x z t < -> expf m z t
eqc_trans : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y z -> eqc m x z
nf = fix nf (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nf m0 + 1 | L m0 zero x y => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1) | L m0 one x y => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1) end : fmap -> Z
exd_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z < -> exd m z
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1...
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1 m0...
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z
A_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A m j z
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
A_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A_1 m j z
expfo = fun (m : fmap) (x z t : dart) => expf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) z t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
eqc_cA_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x (cA m k y) -> eqc m x y
eqc_eqc_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA m k y)
eqc_eqc_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k y)
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
eqc_eqc_cF : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cF m y)
eqc_cA_1_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m (cA_1 m k x) y -> eqc m x y
eqc_symm : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y x
planarity_crit_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y))
eqc_exd_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> exd m x /\ exd m y
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
planarity_crit_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y)
nc = fix nc (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nc m0 + 1 | L m0 _ x y => nc m0 - (if eqc_dec m0 x y then 0 else 1) end : fmap -> Z
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
eqc_cA_1_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k x)
eqc_refl : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), exd m x -> eqc m x x
ne = fix ne (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => ne m0 + 1 | L m0 zero _ _ => ne m0 - 1 | L m0 one _ _ => ne m0 end : fmap -> Z
nv = fix nv (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nv m0 + 1 | L m0 zero _ _ => nv m0 | L m0 one _ _ => nv m0 - 1 end : fmap -> Z
nd = fix nd (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nd m0 + 1 | L m0 _ _ _ => nd m0 end : fmap -> Z
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
MF.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
eqc_Iter_cF : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> eqc m z (Iter (cF m) n z)

```  
intros m k x z t H1 H2 H3 xk m0.
intros H.
split.
- intro H4. left. exact H4.
- intro H4. right. left. split.
  + exact H.
  + exact H4.
```

original: intros m k x z t H1 H2 H3 xk m0. intros H. split. - intro H4. left. apply H4. - intro H4. right. left. split. + apply H. + apply H4.
